queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select concat('MRN_SPE05#LI',mrqr_pur_req.pr,'#',mrqr_pur_req.pr) DD , mrqr_pur_req.pr , concat('MRN_SPE07#LI',mrqr_pur_req.name_nl,'#',mrqr_pur_req.name_fr) Name , left(mrqr_pur_req.matman,1) 'Sec' , concat('MRN_SPE09#LI','01####',mrqr_pur_req.matman) 'MM' , concat('MRN_SPE09#LI','01##Organism##',mrqr_pur_req.LS) 'LS' , concat('MRN_SPE09#LI','03#Lookup#',mrqr_pur_req_ver.status,'#0',mrqr_pur_req_ver.status) 'Status' , mrqr_pur_req.SPEC_COMPLETE 'SpecOK' , mrqr_pur_req.invest_basis_amount 'InvBas' , mrqr_pur_req.invest_subst_amount 'InvSub' , mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr_version 'Version' , mrqr_pur_req_ver.estimated_price 'VersionEst' , pr_bud.BudgBas , pr_bud.BudgSub , pr_bud.year 'BudgYr' -- , dos_circ.dossier from mrqr_pur_req inner join (select pr , pr_version_id id , max(pr_version) pr_max from mrqr_pur_req_ver where not(status='U') group by pr )pr_version on mrqr_pur_req.pr=pr_version.pr inner join mrqr_pur_req_ver on mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr_version=pr_version.pr_max and mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr=pr_version.pr inner join (select pr , pr_version_id , pr_version_bud_id , sum(amount) 'BudgBas' , sum(substitution_amount) 'BudgSub' , year from mrqr_pur_req_ver_bud where year='pYEAR' group by pr, pr_version_id,year )pr_bud on pr_bud.pr_version_id=mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr_version_id and pr_bud.year=mrqr_pur_req_ver.year -- left join -- (select mrqr_dos.dossier -- from (select -- mrqr_dos.dossier -- , max(mrqr_dos.dossier_version) dos_max -- from mrqr_dos where not(status in ('C','E','O','U')) and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(resp_org,1)='pSECTION') -- group by mrqR_dos.dossier) dos_version inner join mrqr_dos on mrqr_dos.dossier=dos_version.dossier and -- mrqr_dos.dossier_version=dos_version.dos_max inner join mrqr_dos_circlist on mrqr_dos.dossier_id=mrqr_dos_circlist.dossier_id where mrqr_dos_circlist.result='TIC')dos_circ on dos_circ.dossier=mrqr_pur_req.pr
where mrqr_pur_req.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and IF('pMATMAN'='',true,mrqr_pur_req.matman='pMATMAN') and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(mrqr_pur_req.matman,1)='pSECTION') and IF('pDIVISION'='Sys',left(mrqr_pur_req.matman,1) in ('S','R','A','N'),left(mrqr_pur_req.matman,1) in ('C','I'))
